lbpInitializationParams().details: The implementing contract MUST ensure that these values are correct at the time of calling

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

currency().notice: Returns the currency used by the initializer

endBlock().notice: Returns the end block of the initializer

fundsRecipient().notice: Returns the address which will receive the raised currency

lbpInitializationParams().notice: Returns the LBP initialization parameters as determined by the implementing contract

onTokensReceived().notice: Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute

startBlock().notice: Returns the start block of the initializer

token().notice: Returns the token used by the initializer

tokensRecipient().notice: Returns the address which will receive the unsold tokens

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply of the token used by the initializer
